de.unlixx.runpng.util.undo

Class UndoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.util.undo.UndoManager

  • public class UndoManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the manager class for all undo and redo actions.

    • Method Detail

      • addUndoListener

        public void addUndoListener(UndoListener listener)
        Adds an UndoListener to this manager.
        Parameters:
        listener - An object which implements the UndoListener interface.

      • removeUndoListener

        public void removeUndoListener(UndoListener listener)
        Removes an UndoListener from this manager.
        Parameters:
        listener - An object which implements the UndoListener interface.

      • add

        public void add(Undoable<?> undo)
        Adds an Undoable on top of the current position. All possible Undoables above will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        undo - An Undoable object.

      • fireUndoEvent

        protected void fireUndoEvent(UndoManager.TYPE type,
                             Undoable<?> undo)
        Fires an UndoEvent to all listeners.
        Parameters:
        type - One of TYPE ADD, UNDO, REDO.
        undo - The involved Undoable object.

      • canUndo

        public boolean canUndo()
        Checks whether an undo is possible.
        Returns:
        True, if an undo is possible.

      • getUndoActionText

        public java.lang.String getUndoActionText()
        Gets a string describing the next available undo action.
        Returns:
        A string describing the next available undo action, or the empty string if undo is not possible yet.

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Invokes an undo action if possible.

      • canRedo

        public boolean canRedo()
        Checks whether a redo is possible.
        Returns:
        True, if a redo is possible.

      • getRedoActionText

        public java.lang.String getRedoActionText()
        Gets a string describing the next available redo action.
        Returns:
        A string describing the next available redo action, or the empty string if redo is not possible yet.

      • redo

        public void redo()
        Invokes a redo action if possible.

      • buildActionText

        static java.lang.String buildActionText(Undoable<?> undo)
        Internal use.
        Parameters:
        undo - An Undoable object.
        Returns:
        A string containing the completed text.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets this manager to initial state.

      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        Checks whether this UndoManager's current position is away from the clean position.
        Returns:
        True, if this UndoManager is in dirty state.

      • isUndoing

        public boolean isUndoing()
        Checks whether this UndoManager is currently undoing.
        Returns:
        True, if this UndoManager is currently undoing.

      • isRedoing

        public boolean isRedoing()
        Checks whether this UndoManager is currently redoing.
        Returns:
        True, if this UndoManager is currently redoing.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Checks whether this UndoManager is currently undoing or redoing.
        Returns:
        True, if this UndoManager is currently undoing or redoing.

      • setClean

        public void setClean()
        Marks the current undo position as the clean position. I. e. in case the file has been saved, but there are still Undoables lingering in the list.
